## Helper.readDir() function

Recursively read directory contents with filtering support

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function readDir(dirPath: string, filter?: (filePath: string, dirent: fs.Dirent) => boolean, prefix?: string): Promise<string[]>;
```
